name: Cubepocalypse
description:
Cubepocalypse is a 3D singleplayer shoot em up where your only goal is to kill all of the things and survive as long as possible. 

This game was developed in 10 hours. 

Instructions: 

Shoot bullets at enemies to kill them in the face (faces not included).  If an enemy touches you, you die. 

  • Move - Mouse
  • Fire - Left Click

Developer Information:

Developer - ShockingShots
